location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Coll 30/144 'Oil: Proposed transfer of the "beneficial ownership" of certain shares in the Kuwait Oil Co. held by the Anglo-Iranian Oil Co.'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the inside front cover with 1, and terminates at the last folio with 20; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file concerns a proposal by the Anglo-Iranian Oil Company Limited to transfer the 'beneficial ownership' of the shares the company held in the Kuwait Oil Company Limited to the D'Arcy Exploration Company Limited.The papers show that the India Office and the Foreign Office consented to the company's proposal, on condition that no subsequent transfer of relevant shares or beneficial ownership should be made without the approval of HM Government.The file includes a divider, which gives a list of correspondence references contained in the file by year. This is placed at the back of the correspondence.
